snippet: The studio behind "The Social Network," a dramatic reimagining of the origins of Facebook, has worked with blogs and organizations to convince a tech-savvy crowd that the movie is worth seeing.

headline.main: Studio Behind Facebook Movie Woos Techies

abstract: The studio behind "The Social Network," a dramatic reimagining of the origins of Facebook, has worked with blogs and organizations to convince a tech-savvy crowd that the movie is worth seeing.
